attributes.action: Make it a legal requirement that pubs serve a full pint (568ml) of beer or cider
attributes.background: Many establishments routinely underfill pints, reducing value and breaching consumer rights. We call for stricter enforcement, clearer guidelines, and penalties for non-compliance to protect customers and uphold trading standards. A pint should be a pint—nothing less.

rejection.details: There are already laws on weights and measures that beer and cider must be sold in multiples of a half pint https://www.gov.uk/weights-measures-and-packaging-the-law/specified-quantities
